channel.title: Authors on Pedro F. Proença
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Pedro F. Proença

item.description: Computer vision wizard and surfer from Portugal. Currently, I am working as a Research Fellow for the Future AI and Robotics for Space Hub, developing visual perception methods for on-orbit robotic operations. I did my PhD on Probabilistic Visual Odometry using RGB-D and Geometric primitives for Man-made Environments. I am particularly interested in modelling uncertainty and using multiple view geometry, deep learning and computer graphics to solve computer vision problems.
